name: Invaderion
description:
Invaderion - When Invaders get Invaded - is a bullet-hell game made for the Messy Coder Jam 2022. You have to defeat 12 bosses to beat the game, good luck! Achievements included.

This is a music game and I composed the battle music. The bullets are in sync with the music. You can hear the Stage Theme here: https://musescore.com/user/43142831/scores/7582685/s/o7E5tE

Controls:
  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Left Shift: Focus
  • Enter: Pause Game
